english_example_sentence: If the yellow leaves were to fall from the tree, the weather would be cold.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы жёлтые листья упали с дерева, погода была бы холодной.
turkish_example_sentence: Sarı yapraklar ağaçtan düşseler, hava soğuk olurdu.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sarı yapraklar ağaçtan ______, hava soğuk olurdu.
